original_title: Trivium - A Light Or A Distant Mirror Live Stream

This will be a 100% live performance with a brand new stage production and arena-style visual show that will stream globally from Full Sail Live, the state of the art event and broadcast arena at Full Sail University in the bandâ€™s hometown of Orlando, Florida
